sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import styled from 'styled-components' const TodoItem = ({ text, completed, onComplete }) => ( {/* [{completed ? 'x' : ' '}] {text} */} Card Title Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. ) const Wrapper = styled.p` font-size: 24px; cursor: pointer; margin-right:16px ` const Text = styled.span` text-decoration: ${props => (props.completed ? 'line-through' : 'none')}; ` export default TodoItem
